text: @HC_Richardson Oh no. Acc to my rwnj Veteran significant other it’s all a Dem hoax . And “why is it there were no cases of coronavirus after the SuperBowl.”Oh and he’s 65 in a high risk group — a fib, high cholesterol and bo co trolled by meds.

entity.name: Super Bowl LIV
entity.description:
The Chiefs scored 21 straight points in the fourth quarter to beat the 49ers 31-20 at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami, Florida. Here is how the game unfolded.
